pageContent: Background: Prostate cancer (PCa) treatments commonly lead to erectile difficulties. While the mainstay treatment is erectile aids (EAs) to promote erectile recovery, some men never use these treatments and those whose do use EAs often abandon them in the long-term.

metaData.source:
Effect of erectile dysfunction following prostate cancer treatment
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/26576913/
